Sentencas: Polycrystalline La1-xKxCoO3 (0 <= x <= 0.2) rare earth cobaltates have been synthesized by a solution combustion method using glycine as a fuel.
Titulo: Synthesis and measurement of structural and magnetic properties of K-doped LaCoO3 perovskite materials

Sentencas: The synthesized ceramic materials were characterized by powder X-ray diffraction (XRD), scanning electron microscopy (SEM), Fourier transform infrared spectroscopy (FTIR), and magnetic measurements and studied for physical properties, such as photocatalytic activity.
Titulo: Synthesis and measurement of structural and magnetic properties of K-doped LaCoO3 perovskite materials

Sentencas: FTIR measurements in conjunction with XRD showed that phases beyond 10% K doping are accompanied by small amounts of impurities.
Titulo: Synthesis and measurement of structural and magnetic properties of K-doped LaCoO3 perovskite materials

Sentencas: Chemical titrations show the presence of Co4+ and account for the Co3+-Co4+ mixed-valency of the system.
Titulo: Synthesis and measurement of structural and magnetic properties of K-doped LaCoO3 perovskite materials

Sentencas: The parent LaCoO3 shows spin-glass transition at low temperatures, whereas doped samples show transition from spin-glass behavior to paramagnetic ordering on progressive doping of K. Mixed-conductor nature of these ceramics positions them as viable candidates for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) applications.
Titulo: Synthesis and measurement of structural and magnetic properties of K-doped LaCoO3 perovskite materials
